Master Israeli Krav Maga at Home

Learn how to protect yourself against attack with the highly effective style of Israeli Krav Maga. In this course you will gain:

  • The ability to defend yourself and survive in a life threatening attack
  • An incredible total-body workout, which will shred fat and build lean muscle
  • Real rank at your own pace with one on one feedback
  • All of it at the fraction of the cost of a traditional studio

Take advantage of this chance to protect yourself and the ones you love with our no commitment FREE Krav Maga beginners course!

Our Core Benifits

Train Whenever, Whereever

With the Global Martial Arts learning platform you can train wherever you want to, across your favorite devices, at a time that works best with your schedule.

Fraction of the Cost of a Tradition Studio

Traditional martial arts studios can cost hundreds of dollars a month, with GMAU you will have everything you need to learn your favorite martial art for as little as $39/month. Save thousands on your path to blackbelt!

Learn Martial Arts from Home

We custom tailor the learning process for you to be able to learn in the comfort of your own home. No more having to rush to get to a session or being one in a crowd. Your journey to mastery is yours and we focus on you by providing exclusive one on one feedback

Course Overview
Your Path to Self Defense

Our Krav Maga program will give you everything you need to learn the art of self defense from our education platform to one on one feedback.

A Complete Guided Course from White to Black Belt

20+ hours of HD video lessons teaching all material in the white to black belt syllabus.

More than 50 follow-along classes (30-40 minutes long), which are just like attending a real “live” Krav Maga class.

Earn Real Rank and Get Instructor Support from your Black Belt Instructor.

Once you’ve learned the rank requirements and logged enough hours, you can submit your video test!

Ask your instructor questions, and get video reviews with corrections and feedback.

Fresh Training Every Week, with New ways for you to Practice and Progress.

Every week a new lesson or class releases. There is always something new to learn.

New tools are being added to the GMAU student dashboard to make training at home fun and successful.

Our Simple to Use Online Learning Platform

Get access to all of our course work across all of your favorite devices. Be able to screencast to your television for classes, and have your progress tracked automatically so you always know where you are on your journey to mastery.

Course Curriculum

Our instructors uphold the founding principles of Krav Maga, while evolving aspects to be as dynamic as possible.

Includes a Complete White to Black Belt Level Course of Study. It’s all here.

You will learn: awareness, stances, combatives, self defense techniques, groundfighting, knife, gun, blunt weapons, takedown, control maneuvers, and the principles of fighting.

Each technique is instructed with multiple angles, a detailed breakdown, step-by-step, and home practice drills.

Follow Along Classes and Workouts. Just like being in a "Live" Krav Maga Class.

The most natural way to learn and practice. A class includes a warm up, lessons, drills, and a cool down.

The classes help you get more repetition, through a variety of reality and stress drills.

Instructor Support With
Anytime Feedback

Ask questions, get helpful feedback, and motivation from your (real) instructor. We are there to hold you accountable and see you succeed.

Message your Instructor and get Your Progress Reviewed Anytime.

Interact directly with your instructor whenever you need guidance.

Submit a video for review and corrections if you need some extra support.

Find a Training Partner with the Student Locator.

Easily locate and connect with other GMAU students in your area.

Start a “Global Garage” and start training with friends.

Earn Real Rank at Home

You can test and achieve real rank in Israeli Krav Maga, through our proven video testing and feedback process.

Test and Receive Detailed Feedback and Corrections from your Instructor.

Submit your video test. No negativity or anxiety, we use testing as a form of improvement and progress.

Receive a personalized feedback video and detailed guidance from your instructor.

Once You Pass, We will Mail you the Official Certificate of Rank.

After all of that hard work, you deserve the officially accredited certification.

Certificates issued are the same as those awarded to students training with us locally.

Commonly Asked Questions

Please feel free to reach out to us if you don't see your question below!

How does Testing Work?

Do I Need a Partner to Participate in the GMAU Krav Maga Program?

Yes. You can practice and learn many techniques on your own. But in order to take the rank exam, you will need a partner to help you demonstrate your requirements. Also, to show a true level of proficiency, consistent practice with a training partner is a necessity. Krav Maga is a contact art, you literally need contact practice in order to learn and perfect the concepts.

Can My Partner (or Family Members) Also take a Level Exam and Become Certified?
